question: My boyfriend was just diagnosed with type 2 diabetes, while my son was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes in November of 2008. My boyfriend has no health insurance, and no regular doctor, the hospital put him on Humulin 70/30, my son is on humulin N and humalog what is the difference between the insulins? And could my boyerfriend be put on the same insulin as my son, so we don't waste so much?
title: Difference between Humulin 70/30 and Humulin
